title: Do you pay for anything with money? - Quora

response.answer_text: Money is a social construct meant to shorten the process. It allows one to purchase things without having labored to create the the things one desire. It positions one in the social pecking order due to the handlers ability to give others the capability to purchase what they desire. Can money find a soul mate? In a sense it can.It enables you ability to go to places were people congregate and to court others.  It may also impress the woman you wish to court. Is money necessary?  Absolutely not.  Money is an imaginary construct with little real value and in many cultures is deemed undesirable for most situations. Many primal cultures see the issues which money creates and wish to avoid it and simply divide the labor amongst the community. The still date with dowries in most cases so a young man will still need to Labour to attract a woman(her family specifically).  however in other cultures the only thing needed to attract a date is superior beauty. Any way you look at it, love is not free.
